com.magnet.android.mms.utils

Class StartActivityReceiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.BroadcastReceiver
      • com.magnet.android.mms.utils.StartActivityReceiver

  • public class StartActivityReceiver
extends android.content.BroadcastReceiver
    Redirects a broadcast intent to an activity. Make sure that the activity has the DEFAULT category, and launch using SingleTop mode. The following AndroidManifest.xml fragment shows how to redirect an intent with the action com.acme.action.CALL_STATE_CHANGED to MySampleActivity:

       <activity
       android:name=".MySampleActivity"
       android:label="@string/app_name" 
       android:launchMode="singleTop" 
       android:alwaysRetainTaskState="true">
     <intent-filter>
       <action android:name="com.acme.action.CALL_STATE_CHANGED" />
       <category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" />
     </intent-filter>
   </activity>

   <receiver android:name="com.magnet.android.mms.utils.StartActivityReceiver">
     <intent-filter>
       <action android:name="com.acme.action.CALL_STATE_CHANGED" />
     </intent-filter>
   </receiver>
